description: Set keybindings for the ACE editor. Choose between Vim and Emacs style keybindings. In Emacs mode, use Ctrl+X Ctrl+S to save input.

values.description: Use Vim-style keybindings in ACE editor (default)
Use Emacs-style keybindings in ACE editor. Save with Ctrl+X Ctrl+S.

notes: This setting controls keyboard handler for the ACE editor used in Surfingkeys' text input areas. Invalid values default to 'vim'.
